user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and reliable underwear that fits well and does not cause discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would provide control and prevent muffin top. However, the product did not meet my expectations, especially for my body type, which led to disappointment.

I wanted a comfortable and modest style of underwear that would stay in place and not cause discomfort. While the design was appealing, the quality issues with the material made me reconsider my choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer true comfort and support, especially in clothing items like bras and pants. I value features such as a good fit, soft and breathable materials, and designs that accommodate my body shape without being clingy or unflattering. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be styled for different occasions, as well as those that maintain their quality after washing. On the other hand, I dislike products that are poorly sized, especially those that are too large or clingy, as well as items made from low-quality materials that do not hold up over time. I also find it frustrating when clothing does not fit well in specific areas, such as the waist or armholes, leading to discomfort or the need for constant adjustments.

conversation.content: I want comfortable and reliable underwear that fits well and does not cause discomfort. within my expected price range: [8.46, 12.96]

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Warner's Women's Blissful Benefits No Muffin Top 3 Pack Brief Panty> / Item ID: B076DMH4NQ / Price: $12.96 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Update your outfit essentials with the blissful benefits by Warner's no muffin top panties. Their flat waistband minimizes any bulge to ensure a smooth appearance under clothing. Made of soft polyester, they're comfortable enough for everyday. The addition of elastane provides subtle stretch to create a precise fit that moves along with you. These blissful benefits by Warner's panties provide full coverage in the back for a sensible addition to your intimates wardrobe. Their timeless silhouette complements any body type. A tag less design ensures no itch. With a variety of patterns and colors to choose from, you can have a new look every day (each sold separately). select from different styles. These brief panties are machine washable for easy-care convenience. Pair them with your favorite bra to complete the ensemble."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Brief> / Item ID: B075J3T6MD / Price: $7.06 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® brief is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-rise, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic brief cut, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."]
